apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices portrays a loving couple, with one person showcasing a medium-dark skin tone and the other a medium-light skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart positioned between them. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading creates a soft, appealing glow around the heart and the couple's silhouettes, suggesting deep affection and a strong bond.  It's a beautiful way to represent romantic love, partnership, and the joy of shared connection, rendered with the characteristic warmth and polish found on Apple devices.
